title: VMware OpenSimulator Appliance
description:
----------------------------------------------------
Unofficial OpenSimulator VMware Appliance by HashBox
----------------------------------------------------
Neither I, nor the OpenSimulator Developers will be held responsible for any Damages that may occur through use of this appliance.

Based on the Ubuntu 7.10 Server + SSH appliance from http://www.vmware.com/appliances/directory/1067

Changes:
* apt-get update + upgrade
* apt-get installed mono + mono compiler + screen + irssi + rkhunter + chkrootkit
* Modified /etc/issue(.net)
* Added init script for OpenSim
* Added login script for user (/bin/osconsole)
* SVN Checkout&#039;d both the Stable 0.5 release of OpenSim and the trunk into /opt/opensim/
* Added update script for OpenSim (/bin/osupdate)

For more information see http://www.opensimulator.org/wiki/VMware_Appliance
